QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Family troubles - resources
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on child abuse , incest, domestic violence , and family troubles: Administration for Children & Families -- www.acf.hhs.gov , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention - www.cdc.gov/violenceprevention/communicationresources/infographics/CAN.html , Childhelp -- www.childhelp.org , Child Welfare Gateway Information -- www.childwelfare.gov , National Child Traumatic Stress Network -- www.nctsn.org/about-us/contact-us/get-help-now , National Domestic Violence Hotline -- www.thehotline.org , National Runaway Safeline -- www.1800runaway.org , Prevent Child Abuse America -- preventchildabuse.org , RAINN (Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network) -- www.rainn.org ,
